data.title: Baily Thomas Provident Fund
data.text:
During this period of unprecedented pressure, we wish to remind beneficiaries that grants are available for those in financial hardship, the criteria for which are set out on our website. Go to What We Do or click the link here Hardship

Beneficiaries qualifying for means-tested benefits who may require additional support at this time, are also invited to contact the Baily Thomas office to discuss ways in which additional support could be provided.

Issue 3 Summer 2024 - click on the image to open the newsletter.

You can also read this issue and any previous issues of the newsletter, by going to the News page

The Beneficiary Liaison Group (BLG) has taken on responsibility for the magazine.
